  • Description: SequenceEvent: LEAKING FLAMMABLE LIQUID DURING TRANSIT, UNLOADED, PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS LEAKING FLAMMABLE LIQUID INSIDE A WET SOILED BOX SOILING ALL CONTENTS INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2023100793
item.description:
Report X-2023100793

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-15
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT

  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: The IBC of UN3267 arrived to 149/SLC with a loose cap. The IBC had less than 2 oz of corrosive liquid on top of the container due to the ~loose cap.
